Profile Summary 
• 
Working as a Technical Lead at BricTech Softwares Pvt. Ltd. (Unit of Prohaktiv Inc.), 
Pune since last around 3 years 
• 
Earlier worked as Lead Engineer and Associate Technical Lead at Amura Marketing 
Technologies, Pune and Harbinger Systems Pvt. Ltd., Pune respectively 
• 
Total of 8 years of experience mainly on Ruby on Rails, Node.JS and Groovy on Grails, 
JavaScript, Bootstrap, MySql, PostGreSQL, AWS, MongoDb, OrientDb etc. 
• 
Good Experience in No-SQL databases as well as AWS cloud deployment and use of 
their related services like s3, SNS etc. 
• 
Excellent in almost all the aspects of Software Development. Having good experience 
with Agile methodology of Software Development 
• 
Worked on Linux Platform (Ubuntu) 
• 
Having good experience in requirement gathering, requirement and technical analysis, 
customer communication, technical architecture, leading and mentoring team etc. along 
with core development experience 
• 
Holds US B1 visa. 
Technical Summary 
• 
Programming Languages: Ruby, Groovy, Javascript, PHP 
• 
Frameworks: Rails3.2 & 4, Grails, Node.Js, Compound.Js, Rspecs, Cucumber, Sails JS 
• 
Databases: OrientDb, Redis, Postgres, MySql, MongoDb 
• 
Operating Systems: Windows, Cent OS, Ubuntu (Linux) 
• 
Other tools and technologies: GitHub, Gitlab, Code Climate, New Relic, Phabricator

Project Profile 
: 
Deluxe eChecks is web based application developed for convenient use of paperless checks. 
This system enables user to send out the paperless checks through email to their payees. This 
helps payees to print and deposit these checks to their respective accounts either through 
the application or depositing in person in the bank. 
My Contribution: 
• 
Working as a Technical Lead for eChecks 
• 
Handling team of 6 developers including few junior developers 
• 
Technical analysis as well as requirement gathering and analysis 
• 
Technically mentoring the team and reviewing their codes 
• 
Involved in architecture and system design. 
• 
Research, analysis and development of various features and deployment 
• 
Involved in client communication, requirement gathering and analysis as well as 
designing functional flow of various modules and completing the technical analysis 
and design 
• 
Involved in Sprint planning as well as milestone planning 
• 
Visited onsite office at US during one of our major release and worked from there for 
almost around 6 months upon client invitation.

Sell.do is a platform for enhancing digital marketing. Currently, it is focused on the Real Estate

July 2013 – Nov 2015 
Project Profile 
: 
MentorString is a virtual mentoring and collaboration platform where employees of 
organizations can build their connections with other individuals of various skills and allows them 
to build their own network based on their interests and skills. Also, this application enables 
organization to keep track of the skills and interests of individuals and perform certain activities 
for their improvement. 
My Contribution: 
• 
Involved in complete architecture and design of the application from the scratch 
• 
Technical analysis as well as requirement gathering and analysis 
• 
Technically mentoring the team and reviewing their codes 
• 
AWS setup as well as setup of their related services like SNS, S3 etc. 
• 
Using node for real-time notification and chat. 
• 
Involved in architecture and system design. 
• 
Combined Code-base owner 
• 
Initial POC (string diagram) and estimates for winning the project 
• 
Research, analysis and development of various features and deployment 
• 
Involved in client communication, requirement gathering and analysis as well as 
designing functional flow of various modules and completing the technical analysis 
and design

Project Profile 
: 
Cisco Services Career Connection (CSSC) is a web based application for employees of an 
organization where they can undergo various training programs and training courses. They can 
track their own progress and contribute to various other training programs. 
My Contribution: 
• 
Mainly involved in technical design, analysis, research activities and development 
• 
Worked as core developer for a module called as Learning Plan 
3 
• 
Effectively worked on client side as well as backend development 
• 
Also, worked on various other modules like Learning Paths, Site setup etc 
• 
Owned development as well as completion of unit test cases 
• 
Involved in requirement understanding, analysis and weekly client calls and 
status calls 
• 
Owned complete deployment on internal test environment 
• 
Helped and mentored junior development team and conducted various 
training programs for them

Project Profile 
: 
We as a global eLearning organization developed a cloud based learning hub. Cisco wanted an 
ePUB 3.0 reader to display their content with features like annotations, search etc which aid in 
learning to be integrated with the hub. 
My Contribution: 
• 
Worked as a key developer in developing the EkitServer 
• 
Owned complete deployment on internal environment as well as on 
Production environment after Go-Live 
• 
Worked for various POCs, analysis and research items 
• 
Completely owned the Service Oriented integration of Ekit Server with PLE portal 
• 
Selected as a Support Engineer and worked with client team at Cisco, Bangalore 
for around 5 months 
• 
Was actively involved in CCS and Annotation Server design and development 
• 
Developed a search engine which indexes all the HTML contents of Epub 3.0 
and its integration with Ekit Server
